name: CreateTransferOrder
description:
Create a draft transfer order between locations.

This tool creates a new transfer order in DRAFT status to move CatalogItemVariations between different locations within a Square account. It should be called when there's a need to initiate the transfer of items, allowing you to add or remove items, modify quantities, or update shipping information before finalizing.

parameters.name: transfer_order_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing fields to define a new transfer order. Includes source/destination locations, items, and any additional details.

idempotency_key.description:
A unique string that identifies this CreateTransferOrder request. Keys can be
any valid string but must be unique for every CreateTransferOrder request.

source_location_id.description:
The source [Location](entity:Location) that will send the items. Must be an active location
in your Square account with sufficient inventory of the requested items.

destination_location_id.description:
The destination [Location](entity:Location) that will receive the items. Must be an active location
in your Square account

expected_at.description: Expected transfer date in RFC 3339 format (e.g. "2023-10-01T12:00:00Z").

created_by_team_member_id.description:
ID of the [TeamMember](entity:TeamMember) creating this transfer order. Used for tracking
and auditing purposes.

item_variation_id.description:
ID of the [CatalogItemVariation](entity:CatalogItemVariation) to transfer. Must reference a valid
item variation in the [Catalog](api:Catalog). The item variation must be:
- Active and available for sale
- Enabled for inventory tracking
- Available at the source location

line_items.description: List of [CatalogItemVariation](entity:CatalogItemVariation)s to transfer, including quantities

transfer_order.description:
Data for creating a new transfer order to move [CatalogItemVariation](entity:CatalogItemVariation)s
between [Location](entity:Location)s. Used with the [CreateTransferOrder](api-endpoint:TransferOrders-CreateTransferOrder)
endpoint.

value_schema.description:
An object containing the fields to POST for the request.

See the corresponding object definition for field details.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.
